price: 16. Ha ku dhaqaajin (Nabiyow) carrabkaaga (markuu Waxyigu soo degayo) inaad ku degdegto (Qur’aanka akhrintiisa).
arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā tuḥarrik bihi lisānaka litaʿjala bihi
